title: 421: Connecting With Your Power Animals with Alyson Charles
itunes:title: 421: Connecting With Your Power Animals with Alyson Charles
description:
What is your power animal? In this interview, we dive into the shamanic realms of the various power animals and the medicine each offer us. We dive into the energy medicine of the butterfly, hummingbird, leopard, dolphin, tiger, peacock, pig, owl, shark, leech, bat and more. We discuss how sometimes the animals you fear most carry the most important messages for you. Alyson shares her take on the Year of the Tiger and how we can best utilize our energy for this time. If you’re an animal lover or seen them show up in your meditations/ journeys, this episode is for you!

Doors are opening back up for Dharma Coaching Institute to become a Certified Soul Purpose/ Spiritual Life Coach this March! Join the waitlist here: https://dharmacoachinginstitute.com/

Get Animal Power here: https://www.alysoncharles.com/animalpower

Dive into Alyson’s workshop in Rose Gold Goddesses, my divine feminine mystery schoolthis year. Join the waitlist for next time doors are open here: https://rosegoldgoddesses.com/2022waitlist/

Enjoy RASA the delicious, superfunctional coffee alternatives at wearerasa.com/discount/sahara for 20% off

Try your sustainable Buffy comforter at buffy.co with coupon code SAHARA for $20 off.

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at:
Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose
Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books: www.iamsahararose.com/books
